languages.text: "Вы сделали из бестии, рожденной охотиться и убивать, комнатную зверушку. Без предназначения и дисциплины и человек, и животное обречены на деградацию". {n}Соломон кивает на Глейто, совершенно невозмутимого перед множеством яств.{/n} "Видите? Вот уровень послушания и достоинства, к которому надо стремиться".

traits.locale_text: "Это биологическая машина, специализирующаяся на убийстве, губернатор. Приписывать ей индивидуальность, чувства, эмоции — ошибка, которая может стоить вам не только пальца".

languages.text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."
languages.original_text: "Вы сделали из бестии, рожденной охотиться и убивать, комнатную зверушку. Без предназначения и дисциплины и человек, и животное обречены на деградацию". {n}Соломон кивает на Глейто, совершенно невозмутимого перед множеством яств.{/n} "Видите? Вот уровень послушания и достоинства, к которому надо стремиться".

This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

languages.text: “你把天生擅长杀戮的野兽，变成了受人驯养的宠物。若是失去了目标与纪律，无论是人还是动物，都注定会堕落。”{n}索罗蒙朝格雷托点了点头，格雷托对周围的美味佳肴无动于衷。{/n}“看到了吗？这才是真正的服从与纪律，这才是应当争取实现的目标。”
languages.original_text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

traits.locale_text: “你把天生擅长杀戮的野兽，变成了受人驯养的宠物。若是失去了目标与纪律，无论是人还是动物，都注定会堕落。”{n}索罗蒙朝格雷托点了点头，格雷托对周围的美味佳肴无动于衷。{/n}“看到了吗？这才是真正的服从与纪律，这才是应当争取实现的目标。”

languages.text: «Ha logrado someter a una bestia nacida para cazar y matar, convirtiéndola en una mascota domesticada. Sin propósito ni disciplina, tanto el hombre como el animal están abocados a la degradación». {n}Solomorne señala a Glaito con la cabeza; el cibermastín parece totalmente indiferente a los copiosos manjares.{/n} «¿Se da cuenta? Ese es el grado de obediencia y dignidad al que todos deberíamos aspirar».
languages.original_text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

traits.locale_text: «Ha logrado someter a una bestia nacida para cazar y matar, convirtiéndola en una mascota domesticada. Sin propósito ni disciplina, tanto el hombre como el animal están abocados a la degradación». {n}Solomorne señala a Glaito con la cabeza; el cibermastín parece totalmente indiferente a los copiosos manjares.{/n} «¿Se da cuenta? Ese es el grado de obediencia y dignidad al que todos deberíamos aspirar».

languages.text: "Doğasında avlanmak ve öldürmek olan bir canavarı, evcil bir süs köpeğine çevirmişsiniz. Amaç ve disiplin yoksa insan da hayvan da yozlaşmaya mahkûmdur." {n}Solomorne, farklı lezzetler hakkında hiçbir fikri olmayan Glaito'yu başıyla işaret ediyor.{/n} "Görüyor musunuz? İşte ulaşmaya çalışmamız gereken itaat ve saygınlık seviyesi budur."
languages.original_text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

traits.locale_text: "Doğasında avlanmak ve öldürmek olan bir canavarı, evcil bir süs köpeğine çevirmişsiniz. Amaç ve disiplin yoksa insan da hayvan da yozlaşmaya mahkûmdur." {n}Solomorne, farklı lezzetler hakkında hiçbir fikri olmayan Glaito'yu başıyla işaret ediyor.{/n} "Görüyor musunuz? İşte ulaşmaya çalışmamız gereken itaat ve saygınlık seviyesi budur."

languages.text: 「お前は、狩りをして、捕食するように生まれた獣を飼い慣らされたペットにしている。目的や規律がなければ、人間も動物も同様に零落する運命にある」{n}ソロモーンはグライトに頷き、グライトはその気遣いにまったく平然としている。{/n}「わかるか？これが、我々の目指すべき従順と忠誠というものだ」
languages.original_text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、狩りをして、捕食するように生まれた獣を飼い慣らされたペットにしている。目的や規律がなければ、人間も動物も同様に零落する運命にある」{n}ソロモーンはグライトに頷き、グライトはその気遣いにまったく平然としている。{/n}「わかるか？これが、我々の目指すべき従順と忠誠というものだ」

languages.text: « Vous avez réduit une créature née pour chasser et tuer à un simple animal domestique. Privé de but et de discipline, l'animal, comme l'homme, est voué à la déchéance. » {n}Solomorne adresse un signe de tête à Glaito, qui ne semble pas du tout impressionné par l'abondance de mets sous son nez.{/n} « Vous voyez ? Tel est le niveau d'obéissance et de dignité auquel nous devons aspirer. »
languages.original_text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez réduit une créature née pour chasser et tuer à un simple animal domestique. Privé de but et de discipline, l'animal, comme l'homme, est voué à la déchéance. » {n}Solomorne adresse un signe de tête à Glaito, qui ne semble pas du tout impressionné par l'abondance de mets sous son nez.{/n} « Vous voyez ? Tel est le niveau d'obéissance et de dignité auquel nous devons aspirer. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt ein Tier, das zum Jagen und Töten geboren wurde, zu einem zahmen Haustier gemacht. Ohne Sinn und Disziplin sind Mensch wie Tier dazu verdammt, zu verkommen." {n}Solomorne nickt Glaito zu, der von der Vielfalt der Delikatessen völlig unbeeindruckt ist.{/n} "Seht Ihr? Nach diesem Maß Gehorsam und Würde sollten wir streben."
languages.original_text: "You have reduced a beast, born to hunt and kill, to a domesticated pet. Without purpose and discipline, both man and animal alike are destined for degradation." {n}Solomorne nods at Glaito, who is completely unfazed by the multitude of delicacies.{/n} "See? This is the level of obedience and dignity we should strive for."
